topic.fullpath: Topic :: Multimedia :: Sound/Audio :: CD Audio :: CD Ripping

name: Mp3Cover: Create cd cover for (mp3) CDs
short_description: Creates printable covers for your (mp3) CD/DVDs. Creates a LaTeX file with front and back covers listing of artistnames, albumnames and songnames by examining the directory structure and the MP3 tags. The output PS/PDF can then be printed easily.
